content: The navy blue sweater is really nice, and I'm planning to wear it with some lighter-washed jeans and a white t-shirt for a casual spring look. I might also try pairing it with a flowy skirt for a more feminine outfit. By the way, I've been thinking about getting some of my clothes tailored, like my new khaki capri pants from the Gap Factory Store, which are a bit too long. Do you have any tips on how to find a good tailor?
